name: Contract Type extractor
description: Schema for extracting data from contracts

contractType.title: Contract type
contractType.description: one of the following: SLA, NDA, amendment, framework contract, contract, other.

language.title: Contract language
language.description: one of the following: french, german, english, other.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the party and how it's referred to in the contract.

signed_status.title: Signed Status
signed_status.description: The status indicating whether the contract is signed, can be YES or NO.

Agreement Date.title: Date of Signature
Agreement Date.description: The date when the contract was signed.

instruction: Use information about the contract from the given user input.
